column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Love Love Love this place! Everything I have tried here has been really amazing. Their menu items change weekly. So far I have had their boudain eggs benedict
column3: and a fish and dumplings dish. All were creative dishes packed with flavor. From the bakery I have had their cheesecake (a must!)
column7: and their mixed berry fruit tart. Their vanilla lattes are really good too.. They use actual vanilla bean in it. One of my fav little places to eat.
